byline.original: By JOE FIORE and BRAD STENGER

abstract: For the next TimesOpen we're excited to host a timely, critical look at the tradeoffs between privacy and personalization in Web and mobile apps.
snippet: For the next TimesOpen we're excited to host a timely, critical look at the tradeoffs between privacy and personalization in Web and mobile apps.
lead_paragraph: For the next TimesOpen we're excited to host a timely, critical look at the tradeoffs between privacy and personalization in Web and mobile apps. The event takes place on Tuesday, October 25, starting at 6:30 p.m. in the Times Building conference facility on the 15th floor. Registration is open. There is no cost to attend. Seats are limited.
